workxp.title: Mentor at Udacity, Intermediate Javascript, React, Cloud and Devops (AWS) Nanodegrees
text: Udacity is an online education platform which partners with companies like Google, Facebook, Github, Amazon and IBM to bring industry standard education programs to prepare candidates for the job market.
Reviewed thousands of projects consistently rating high on  performance metrics, review rating (>4.9/5), avg project review turnaround time (<1hour/8hours).
Resolved hundreds of issues on Javascript, React/Redux, AWS, assisting students on their learning experience teaching the what, how and why.

projects.title: Serverless Todo App
projects.text: A react todo app. The backend is deployed using Serverless and Cloudformation template. I implemented OAuth for authentication and DynamoDB for the database. Images are uploaded to S3 bucket with a presigned URL. Implemented warmup (reducing latency on cold start), request validation (reducing costs), canary deployment and xray. Please refer to readme for full functionality.

projects.title: Would you Rather
projects.text: Implemented the game in React(Hooks) with Redux. Mocked asynchronous api. Users can login, create new polls and vote on them. Moreover, there is a leaderboard that is updated on each vote.

projects.title: Refactor Monolith to Microservices
projects.text: Refactored a monolith into microservices by leveraging docker containers and kubernetes cluster. The backend is seperated into 2 services, served by a reverseproxy for port 8080. Each service can scale independently through replica sets.

projects.title: Neighbourhood Project
projects.text: Leveraged Yelp API to pull information about pizzerias around Sydney using Google Maps as the canvas. You can change the search query and the results update. The location can be updated as well, the modularity exists, but I didnâ€™t add it to view. In order learn/try Vue, I have refactored the project to Vue.js from Knockout.js and used webpack to bundle it.

projects.title: Waterborn Bali Surf School
projects.text: A high performance commercial site built with Gatsby/React (Lighthouse scores and Livesite url in Readme). Used formik to create contact form with google captcha bot filtering. The site is deployed to edge CDN on AWS.
